title: Clinical Practical Competency Enhancement: Constructivist Learning Design and Practice in Advertising Photography

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design an advertising photo planning process based on constructivist principles.
Learners can collaboratively produce an artifact (advertising photo portfolio) using digital tools (e.g., smartphone apps).
Learners acquire communication skills to improve creative solutions through feedback loops.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
